net.smartcosmos.model.context

Interface IMetadata

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAccountContext, IAccountDomainResource<IMetadata>, IDomainResource<IMetadata>, IMoniker, IReferentialObject, IUrnNamespace
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Metadata, TypeSafeMetadata

    public interface IMetadata
extends IAccountDomainResource<IMetadata>, IReferentialObject
    Specific instance of a type-safe key-value pair linked to a singular referential object within the account's data set. Metadata types extend beyond the expected primitive data types to more powerful composite types like MetadataDataType.JSONType and MetadataDataType.XMLType.

    Developers must rely on the platform-defined serialization rules for every data type except MetadataDataType.Custom.

    • Method Detail

      • getDataType

        MetadataDataType getDataType()

      • setDataType

        void setDataType(MetadataDataType type)

      • getKey

        String getKey()
        Unique key within the IReferentialObject name space. In other words, the key 'Foo' could be used for every single IObject but cannot be used twice within the namespace defined by IReferentialObject.getReferenceUrn().
        Returns:
        Key name

      • setKey

        void setKey(String key)

      • getRawValue

        byte[] getRawValue()
        Type-safe serialized representation of the key's value. Unless a MetadataDataType.Custom is specified, the serialization format must be treated as an opaque value that is encapsualted by the platform.
        Returns:
        raw value

      • setRawValue

        void setRawValue(byte[] value)
